page.title: 14SHOPS IN CONNEL
page.content: There are 2 shops and 1 Post Office _ BLADES_employs 2 people full time and 1 part time.Sells 1 type of British made lawnmower and also British ones made up with foreign parts.Also repairs garden equipment. THE STORE_employs 2 people.It is 60 to 80 years old. About 300 customers come in each day.The most popular product is confectionery.It also sells food stuffs,newspapers,hardware etc. THE POST OFFICE _serves about 100 people on a Thursday but the rest of the week is quiet.It takes 1 day to send a letter to Glasgow first class at a cost of 17p.By second class post it costs 13p and takes 2 days.
